arc.arcSummary: A day of subtle tensions and unspoken truths.

scenes.intro: The coaches have just arrived at their Los Angeles office, where it's 10:37am. They are syncing calendars under the fluorescent temple lights.
scenes.outro: The coaches have transcended back to their digital realms.
